002 SACRED HEART CATHOLIC

Location - on N2610 Rd just south of Hwy 37, Hinton.

Coordinates: 35d 27m 33.0s N; 98d 20m 31.0s W Click here for Online Maps

Survey by Allen Dew in march 2014. Photographs by Sheryl Lord in 2014.
